name: Rain Of Bombs
description:
in this minigame, the player drops bombs upon pedestrians. every day (a round) the player have a limited bombs to drop, use it carefully and try to hit as much as you can. remmber, each pedestrian you will hit gives you points.

after every day, the player can use his score in order to purchase upgrades.

use "space" to drop a bomb. no other keys needed.

note that this game made in about 40% of the time frame.
